Room.Name: The Sporting Pit
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the southern end of a large pit about fifty meters wide.
Room.LongDescription: The Sporting Pit allows barbarians and their kind to experiment with new weapons and armors in battles with outsiders or other worthy barbarian opponents. You are in the higher of the two pits, the other lying to the north, more depressed into the landscape. Less barbarians wander into this pit than into the deeper one to the north.
